video.title: Hacking the System
video.synopsis: Host Brian Brushwood demonstrates how to duplicate a key, talk your way out of a speeding ticket and other helpful life hacks.

episodes.synopsis: From lockouts to theft prevention, life hacker Brian Brushworth demonstrates clever tricks and tips for getting the most from your auto.
episodes.title: Hack Your Car

episodes.synopsis: Your home is your castle and Brian suggests how to keep it that way, by foiling would-be robbers, beefing up locks and choosing effective alarm codes.
episodes.title: Hack Your Home

episodes.synopsis: Hi-tech crimes threaten our personal security, but Brian reveals how to spot hidden dangers like ATM card skimmers, identity scams and credit cons.
episodes.title: Personal Security

episodes.synopsis: Host Brian Brushwood focuses on dining out with ways to spend less, eat heartier and even how to enjoy a bottled beverage without an opener.
episodes.title: Restaurant Ruses

episodes.synopsis: Travel hacking expert Brian Brushwood offers advice on everything from flight upgrades and packing secrets to staying calm amidst airport chaos.
episodes.title: Travel Tricks

episodes.synopsis: Brian offers holiday ideas to keep the season festive, including Valentine's Day canine cupids, New Year's cork tricks and post-party hangover cures.
episodes.title: Holiday Hacks

episodes.synopsis: Brian shares survivalist know-how: starting a fire without matches and cobbling together a DIY gas mask are among his recommended emergency skills.
episodes.title: Survival Hacks

episodes.synopsis: From acing a job interview to winning a round of arm wrestling, life hacker Brian demonstrates techniques for beating the odds to become a winner.
episodes.title: Hacking to Win

episodes.synopsis: From tickets scalpers to fake psychics and bloated car repair costs, life hack guru Brian teaches how to avoid scams and hold on to your dignity.
episodes.title: Scam Artist Hacks

episodes.synopsis: A weekend in the woods shouldn't be a hardship. Host Brian Brushwood shows us how to use everyday items like earbuds to keep campouts under control.
episodes.title: Hacking the Outdoors

episodes.synopsis: Master hacker Brian Brushwood reveals how your own home can save you big bucks with simple changes to lighting, heating, cleaning supplies and more.
episodes.title: Money Hacks

episodes.synopsis: Con artists are everywhere: Bogus valets, thieving street performers and pickpockets. Brian offers insight on how to spot them before they strike.
episodes.title: Hacking Crime
